TextAsset.value: Valkyrie said to meet her in wood shop...
(It's dusty in here... There's sawdust everywhere...
But it smells really good.)
(Everyone's making something.
No one in my family really makes anything.
We all just roll it up.
I wonder what making something is like... )
Heyyyy. Couldn't stay away, huh?
That's called ATTRACTION.
The strong silent type, eh?
Absolutely not.
Good. Strong and silent is pretty boring. Wanna see my Hiromi impression?
LOL, yours is pretty good too.
I wasn't trying to make fun of her!
Relaaaax. I kid because I love.
O-oh. What're you working on?
Oh...
It's a sword. They took away my real one.
Your REAL one?!
Are you in detention because you killed someone with it?!
Like you stabbed them through the heart ...
And then you chopped them up into little pieces...
And fed them to Pac-Man?!
Whoaaa, pretty good imagination on this one.
Sorry... I get carried away. Why DID you get your sword taken away?
â€¦. You're really cute when you're serious.
(She evaded the question?!)
You get this crease in your forehead zone... It makes you look really thoughtful.
(WAS IT DETENTION... FOR MURDER?!)
(That seems... Lenient... )
They took my sword away to punish me... I don't like being separated from it, so I figured I'd just make a temp blade to hold me over.
(Like a really sharp teddy bear... )
(Oh, she's showing me the sword. Wow. It's really nice. I was thinking that she's a little flighty, but...
This is really expertly crafted. It must've taken a lot of dedication and concentration.)
(I wonder what's really going on in her head... Besides all the flirting.)
This sword looks great.
Can I tell you something? I'm a little jealous...
I've never made anything like this. I've definitely never worked with wood before.
You haven't?! OMG, it's super fun!
Is it?
Totally. You should try it out.
I don't know... I have these tiny Katamari hands... They're not good for much besides rolling.
Aw, I like your hands. They're all small and delicate. You should see mine!
(Whoa... They're really strong looking. She's definitely worked with her hands for a very long time.)
Touch them!
Is it ok?
I said so, didn't I?
(I'm going to touch them!)
(Her fingers are long and thin, and ... they're so rough. Her palm feels like warm leather!
Like a crocodile or something.
I rolled one of those up once.)
Ahem...
Hmmm?
I said you could touch them...
But you might be taking too long.
OH! Sorry!
It's okay. I don't mind.
(Am I blushing? I hope not... )
Will you show me how to make a sword... ? It looks fun.
Sure! Just grab some wood from the pile there and bring it to the table saw.
(Whoa, that spinny saw thing looks dangerous... )
Just lay it down and run it through...
Like this?
LOL, uhhhâ€¦ Wow, that's really crooked.
I've never seen someone cut so crooked.
It's gotta be a special talent of yours.
Oh, I think I see what happened.
You have to use the rail as a guide.
If you wait too long it'll burn up, so you gotta do it quick.
It's pretty difficult...
Yeah... It took me a few tries to learn it. We don't have any of this stuff back home.
It's also kind of scary...
It's not THAT scary. Just line it up and push it through, really steady-like. Try it again.
Okay...
No you need to... Like this!
(She got behind me and put her hands on mine...
Her hands are really steady. That rugged texture is suddenly so reassuring... It's comforting to know she's done this so many times before.)
(She's so warm... And her hair smells really nice...
Like a whole rolled up forest... Oak and ash and elm and pine and spruce.)
(Her hands are so sure on mine...
Wasn't there a movie like this?)
Everyone's looking.
AHHH!
(They totally are!)
We should stop!
Ahhh, let them look. They WISH they were having this much fun.
(Making the rest of the sword is fuzzy. All I could think about was the people looking at us.)
(But Valkyrie didn't mind at all. She wasn't bothered in the least!)
(She's confident and fearless.)
(.... I ... like it. I know we're both in high school, but she seems much more worldly.)
(I wonder why that is... And what it has to do with her stint in detention... )
It's done!
Oh!
Sorry, I could only help so much... You definitely have a knack for being bad at this!
HEY! How'd YOURS come out?
Maybe we shouldn't compare...
Oh, come on! How different could they be?
You ARE really good at this...
Next time we hang out, we should go to the roof. We can do some really neat stuff up there!
Just us? Alone?
LOL, sure! It's more fun that way!
Bye!
(Just what 'fun stuff' is she talking about?!)
(My face feels warm. Is this what they call.....
a crush?!
(I'm too young! I'm not ready!)
(Her laugh is really cute... )
